subject: accessing System.out program output from a junit test
msgSnippet: Is it possible to compare error messages that a program prints out to what I know the error message should be, for a given input, in a junit test?  That is,
messageBody:
Is it possible to compare error messages that a program prints out to
what I know the error message should be, for a given input, in a
junit test? That is, sort of intercept the output from
System.out.println and look at it.
